tags.description: Strings applied to the Equipment to add context and used for analytics

refs.description:
<llm-instruction>This part of the input schema is truncated. If you want to pass the property `refs` to the tool, first call the tool `expandSchema` with "/properties/refs" in the list of pointers. <property-description>Upstream references for the Equipment</property-description>
